channel.title: Spelljammer: Adventures in Space
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Spelljammer: Adventures in Space"

item.title: Re: Spelljammer: Adventures in Space
item.content:encoded: With the new lineages, the plan was to create a master page that used the include statement to pull in data from other sub-pages to build out the whole thing. You can check out any of the primary lineages for how some of the others have been built. Should keep the pages a bit smaller and therefore easier to maintain especially when new subraces are released.

item.title: Re: Spelljammer: Adventures in Space
item.content:encoded:
I added a Spelljammer section the setting specific lineages on the Lineage page. You'll have to be the one to add the shortcut to the main page, as well as adding the two backgrounds to the main page also.

Do we have an Archived section for the race/lineage UAs?

item.title: Re: Spelljammer: Adventures in Space
item.content:encoded: Thanks Valkyria! Did you get the main Lineage page updated with the new ones? I think the plan was as lineages were published they would get removed from the UA section and added to the main page for the published version.

item.title: Re: Spelljammer: Adventures in Space
item.content:encoded: I've now finished adding all the new Spelljammer content and updated the relevant pages with the Errata corrections.

item.title: Re: Spelljammer: Adventures in Space
item.content:encoded: Thank you for this! You seem to have missed the changes in the Errata, however. It mostly affects the Hadozee and Astral Elf.

item.title: Spelljammer: Adventures in Space
item.content:encoded:
Hey, I'm a little late on adding these, but I've started adding content from Spelljammer. So far I have created and updated existing pages for the lineages. I'll work on adding backgrounds, spells, and magic items next (and then will start working on adding stuff from the new Dragonlance book after that.)

Lineages:
Astral Elf - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/lineage:elf-astral
Autognome - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/lineage:autognome
Giff - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/lineage:giff
Hadozee - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/lineage:hadozee
Plasmoid - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/lineage:plasmoid
Thri-kreen - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/lineage:thri-kreen

Backgrounds:
Astral Drifter - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:astral-drifter
Wildspacer - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:wildspacer

Spells:
Air Bubble - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/spell:air-bubble
Create Spelljamming Helm - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/spell:create-spelljamming-helm

Magic Items:
Fish Suit - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/wondrous-items:fish-suit
Spelljamming Helm - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/wondrous-items:spelljamming-helm
Talarith - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/wondrous-items:talarith
Wildspace Orrery - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/wondrous-items:wildspace-orrery
